# pds-radio



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                     | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`       | `checked`        | Determines whether or not the radio is checked.                 | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `componentId`   | `component-id`   | String used for radio `id` attribute and label `for` attribute. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | Determines whether or not the radio is disabled.                | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `helperMessage` | `helper-message` | String used for helper message below radio.                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `invalid`       | `invalid`        | It determines whether or not the radio is invalid.              | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`         | `label`          | String used for label text next to radio.                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `name`          | `name`           | String used for radio `name` attribute.                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `required`      | `required`       | It determines whether or not the radio is required.             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `value`         | `value`          | The value of the radio that is submitted with a form.           | `string`  | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------
